title: Noel Brown on Adaptation
itunes:title: Noel Brown on Adaptation
description:
Noel finally makes a real deal appearance as a guest on the interview edition to talk to Chuck about his life, his myriad talents, and his movie crush, Adaptation. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
